snippet: Times readers weigh in on whether Giants running back Ahmad Bradshaw should have scored the go-ahead touchdown with 57 seconds left in the Super Bowl.
abstract: Times readers weigh in on whether Giants running back Ahmad Bradshaw should have scored the go-ahead touchdown with 57 seconds left in the Super Bowl.

headline.main: The Bradshaw Touchdown Debate: Times Readers Weigh in
headline.print_headline: That Touchdown Is Looking Better and Better
